description: The ORDER_ATTRIBUTE table enables you to report on attributes for each order. Currently, you could use value 1 to get all order that pyxis override.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the order attributes (I ORD 32).

columns.description:
The attribute information for the specified order ID and line
